pages.text: The Trails mod only adds one item: the Trail Map. It allows you to map all your trails for further use. $(br2)To use it, click the center block of a trail beacon (see the corresponding category). Once you clicked on every beacon of your trail, you can combine it with a map in the Cartography table and little dots will appear on the map, showing your beacons. The dots are the color your trail map is (remember: you can dye it)

pages.title: How to craft it
pages.text: It is crafted as shown on the next page, and is also dyeable !
